title: Rebuild UniXange Campus Marketplace (Full Redeployment)

requirements.text: Rebuild the full UniXchange backend actor in Motoko with all data types and logic: buy/sell items, rental items, lost & found items, user profiles with @jainuniversity.ac.in email validation, admin email allowlist bypass, and all CRUD operations for each item category.

quotes: Buy / Sell / Rent / Lost & Found sections
Internet Identity login with @jainuniversity.ac.in domain gate

acceptanceCriteria: Backend actor compiles and deploys without errors
User profiles can be created and retrieved
Buy/sell items can be created, listed, and deleted
Rental items can be created, listed, and deleted
Lost & Found items can be created, listed, and deleted
Only @jainuniversity.ac.in emails are accepted (plus admin allowlist)

requirements.text: Rebuild the full React frontend for UniXange with all pages: Homepage (hero + category browse + recent listings), Buy Section, Sell Section (authenticated user's listings), Rent Section, Lost & Found Section, Item Detail page, About, Contact, Privacy, and Terms pages.

quotes: Buy / Sell / Rent / Lost & Found sections

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage renders hero section with AI smart search and category cards
Buy, Sell, Rent, Lost & Found sections each display correct listings
Item Detail page shows image, metadata, and WhatsApp contact button
About, Contact, Privacy, Terms static pages render correctly
Footer displays on all pages with navigation links and UniXange branding

requirements.text: Implement Internet Identity authentication gated to @jainuniversity.ac.in university email domain, with a login modal showing login/signup views, loading state, and access-denied state for non-Jain University accounts.

quotes: Internet Identity login with @jainuniversity.ac.in domain gate

acceptanceCriteria: Users with @jainuniversity.ac.in email can log in successfully
Users without a valid Jain University email see an access-denied message
Admin emails in the allowlist bypass the domain restriction
Login modal shows appropriate loading and error states

requirements.text: Apply a beige and black OLX-inspired visual theme consistently across the entire app, including CSS custom properties, Tailwind config tokens, and component styles.
acceptanceCriteria: Primary background uses beige tones, primary text/accents use black
Theme is consistent across all pages and components
Cards, buttons, and navigation follow the OLX-inspired style

requirements.text: Implement a profile avatar dropdown in the header that displays the logged-in user's name, email, and university, and provides a logout action. The avatar must be visible and accessible on both desktop and mobile views.
acceptanceCriteria: Profile avatar appears in the header when user is authenticated
Clicking the avatar opens a dropdown with user name, email, and university
Dropdown includes a working logout button
Avatar is visible on both desktop and mobile

requirements.text: Implement an Add Item modal form that allows authenticated users to post new listings across all categories (buy/sell/rent/lost/found) with fields for title, description (with AI-generated description support), category, condition, price in ₹, image upload, and WhatsApp contact number.
acceptanceCriteria: Modal opens from a floating add button and from section-specific add buttons
All required fields are validated before submission
Price field uses ₹ currency symbol
AI description generation works from title, category, and condition inputs
Image upload is supported
WhatsApp number field is included
Submitted items appear in the correct section listing

requirements.text: Implement a basic in-app chat feature allowing authenticated users to message each other about listings.
acceptanceCriteria: Authenticated users can initiate a chat from an item listing
Chat messages are stored in the backend and retrievable
Users can view and send messages in a chat thread

constraints: All backend logic must remain in a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo
Frontend immutable paths (hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, hooks/useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui) must not be modified
University email validation must restrict access to @jainuniversity.ac.in domain only, with admin allowlist exceptions
nonGoals: Support for universities other than Jain University
